attributes.userName: trump must go on a diet
attributes.title: THIS APP IS WORSE THAN EVERYTHING
attributes.review: Rate this a 1 Star or else Ronald McDonald will steal your Dino nuggets before you could get them from the oven. He will run and steal your TV as well. And then mr. pumpkin face beer belly lookin boy will be re elected and we will all die if you don’t rate this 1 Star

attributes.title: HORRIBLE AND HORRIBLE
attributes.review: So, I downloaded it and...... my taco’s grew feet, came up to my screen, and started hugging the screen and I was starving the whole day!! Please don’t download this app! It’s bad luck! Download it at your own risk!! Unless you wanna die of starvation:c

attributes.title: LITERAL TRASH
attributes.review: no seriously, when i opened the app, i just saw a picture of a trash can. then i realized that it probably was a sign saying trump is trash🤷‍♀️. also don’t ban tik tok because then people will hate you even MORE! xoxo

attributes.title: our president should do better
attributes.review: this app immediately started glitching my phone out and then it stole all the data from my phone and sold it to China

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: This app is so poorly designed! A kindergartner could have made this app work better! I can’t believe this is how the President is choosing to present himself. I wish I could give this app negative stars.

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: I downloaded the app then my laundry machine ran away and the cable bill quadrupled causing my cat to malfunction which made the nanny very upset and cold so my door frame disintegrated. Very upset with thus download 👺 want to speak to a manager 🐒

attributes.title: Trumpet
attributes.review: I was told to vote before i can login! what app does that! I had already given it my email and now i’m spammed every ten minutes about new trump stuff. I cant afford to stay a supporter 😥

attributes.title: The Cheeto story
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to just look right right! Then when I got off there was a naked hot Cheeto man on my lock-screen!!! Then after that everything was fine so I rode my lion to McDonald’s!! Then when I got home and started eating THE NAKED HOT CHEETO MAN WAS AT MY DOOR!!!!🤬🤯🤯😢😢🖕🏼🖕🏼

attributes.title: Glitchy dragon
attributes.review: So I was on this app and every time I opened it the app would just keep glitching and this dragon would appear and it was just really weird and I did not like it. Very terrible app!

attributes.title: Horrible!!!
attributes.review: This app would go off randomly throughout the night and blare random quotes that Trump has said. I would not recommend if you enjoy sleeping or if you enjoy anything good in life.
